team.name: Gabriel Low
team.title: Co-Founder
team.bio: Gabriel hails from New York City. While finishing his degree in Finance and Management at Wharton, Gabriel is a corporate strategy analyst for an American multi-national corporation. He also has prior global strategy experience from working with rapidly-scaling start-ups in India and Israel.
team.about: Gabriel hates wasting time in long lines when he could be swimming, making tahini, or spending time with his 7 siblings.

team.name: Ben Shor
team.title: Co-Founder
team.bio: Ben is from Great Neck, NY. He is currently completing his degree in Economics and Business Management at Columbia University, while working as an analyst for an independent multi-national investment bank. Ben also has financial analysis and investment strategy experience.
team.about: With his busy schedule, Ben does everything he can to save time, so he can spend it running, trying new foods, and traveling.

team.name: Rena Auerbach
team.title: Lead Engineer & Graphic Designer
team.bio: Rena is back home in Chicago, IL after recently graduating from NYU with a BA in Computer Science. Rena is a full-stack developer with experience in a handful of programming languages, but her favorites are Java and JavaScript.
team.about: When she's not avoiding long lines, Rena enjoys playing with her dog, painting, and running her eBay business.

team.name: Leah Womelsdorf
team.title: iOS Developer
team.bio: Leah comes from Fanwood, NJ and just received her BS in Computer Science from Cornell University. Although a full-stack developer, Leah's main interests are Ubiquitous Computing and Machine Learning.
team.about: It's hard for Leah to make time for water skiing, learning German, and playing chess, when she doesn't know how long a trip to the grocery store will take.

team.name: Lauren Treiman
team.title: Data Analyst
team.bio: Lauren was born and raised in Salt Lake City, UT and recently graduated with a BS in Applied Mathematics and Statistics from Emory University. She has a diverse background in data analytics with experience developing statistical models in epidemiology, social networking, swimming, and Major League Baseball operations.
team.about: Instead of waiting in long lines, Lauren would much rather spend her free time playing water polo, swimming, or solving logic puzzles.
